wikipedia_page.main:
Yves Romestan has worked for global corporate companies such as Total, Lafarge, Banques Populaires Group, CEA, Bouygues, Brandt and Walgreens Boots Alliance. 
He founded in 2019 the French-British YRSA Group, which includes a communication agency, a real estate company and a publishing branch.He is also Professor of Economics at the INSEAD.
